description: This file implements the main frontend React component for a notes management application, including authentication, notes CRUD operations, UI rendering, search functionality, and user session handling.

methods.name: fetchWithAuth
methods.description: Utility function to perform fetch requests with Authorization header if auth token is present.

methods.name: handleAuth
methods.description: Handles user login or signup by sending credentials to the backend, manages auth tokens and user state.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Clears user session data and resets application state.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from the backend API, updates notes state.

methods.name: handleSelectNote
methods.description: Selects a note to view or edit based on user interaction.

methods.name: handleNewNote
methods.description: Initiates creation of a new note.

methods.name: handleEditNote
methods.description: Enables editing of the currently selected note.

methods.name: handleDeleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID after user confirmation.

methods.name: handleNoteFormChange
methods.description: Updates the note form state as user types.

methods.name: handleSaveNote
methods.description: Saves a new note or updates an existing note via API.

methods.name: handleCancelEdit
methods.description: Cancels editing mode and resets note form.
